00026 #ifndef RDK2_RMAPS_RTOPOLOGICALFRONTIER
00027 #define RDK2_RMAPS_RTOPOLOGICALFRONTIER
00028 
00029 #include <rdkcore/object/object.h>
00030 #include <rdkcore/geometry/point.h>
00031 #include <rdkcore/container/container.h>
00032 #include <rdkcore/rgraphics/color.h>
00033 
00034 #define DEFAULT_FRONTIER_SIMILARITY_DIST 0.5
00035 
00036 namespace RDK2 { namespace RMaps {
00037     
00038 using namespace RDK2::Geometry;
00039 
00044 struct RTopologicalFrontier : public RDK2::Object {
00045     Point2d point0, point1;
00048     Point2od midpoint;
00049 
00053     RTopologicalFrontier() { };
00059     RTopologicalFrontier(double x0, double y0, double x1, double y1);
00060     inline bool isSimilarTo(const RTopologicalFrontier* topolFront, 
00061                 double frontierSimilarityDist = 
00062                 DEFAULT_FRONTIER_SIMILARITY_DIST) const
00063         { return topolFront->midpoint.distTo(midpoint) < 
00064               frontierSimilarityDist; }
00065 
00068     bool hasStringForVisualization() const { return true; }
00070     std::string getStringForVisualization() const;
00071 
00073 
00074     void read(Reader* r) throw (ReadingException);
00075     void write(Writer* w) const throw (WritingException);
00077     RDK2_DEFAULT_CLONE(RTopologicalFrontier);
00078 };
